definition: to blame/to reprove/to reprimand/to expel/to oust/to reconnoiter/(of territory) to expand/saline marsh

sentences.english: The father scolded the donkey sternly.
But he chided his disciples when they strained themselves in spiritual endeavor.
sentences.chinese: 但當弟子們努力於精神上的飾僞時又遭他斥罵。

sentences.english: The other coaches would be screaming at their girls, humiliating them, shouting at them.
sentences.chinese: 對方教練對自己的球員尖叫着，斥罵她們，大聲嚷嚷。
